resources.string: A new version of OI Flashlight is available.\n%s\nWould you like to upgrade?

Version %s 

 OpenIntents Flashlight helps you find your way in the dark. The display backlight is kept turned on while this application is running.

 OpenIntents allows different Android applications to share data using intents and open interfaces.

 For more information and other great applications visit OpenIntents at www.openintents.org
Acuerdo de Licencia de Usuario Final (EULA) de OI Flashlight
Please check manually for updates or install OI Update for automatic notifications. Current version: %s
